text:
Python is a popular programming language created by Guido van Rossum. 
It is used for web development, data analysis, artificial intelligence, and automation. 
Python emphasizes code readability with its use of significant indentation.

The Amazon Elastic Kubernetes Service (EKS) is a managed Kubernetes service by AWS. 
It helps users run Kubernetes without needing to manage their own control plane or nodes. 
EKS can deploy containerized applications easily and securely at scale.
